name: Siaki Tuikabe
story: Siaki Tuikabe joined the BLUFOR Police force at the age of 18, after growing up in a troubled neighborhood in the Caribbean. He is determined to make a difference and help others who are struggling like he did. Siaki takes his job seriously and always strives to do his best, but he can sometimes come across as overly confident or even arrogant. Despite this, his fellow officers respect him for his dedication and hard work.
